verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fourth \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fourth \add day\add* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w even|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Chislev|strong="H3691"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H7971"\w* \add they of\add* \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Sharezer|strong="H8272"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Regem-melech|strong="H7278"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* men, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w entreat|strong="H2470"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w favor|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*,

\add and\add* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, saying, \w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w separating|strong="H5144"\w* myself, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w And|strong="H8354"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H8354"\w* eat, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H8354"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w ye|strong="H8354"\w* eat \w for|strong="H3588"\w* yourselves, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* yourselves?

\add Should ye\add* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \add hear\add* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H7961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w thereof|strong="H5892"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w her|strong="H5439"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w South|strong="H5045"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w lowland|strong="H8219"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* spoken, saying, \w Execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7356"\w* \w every|strong="H6213"\w* man \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brother;

\w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* \w not|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H6231"\w* widow, \w nor|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H6231"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w the|strong="H6231"\w* \w sojourner|strong="H1616"\w*, \w nor|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H6231"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*; \w and|strong="H6041"\w* let none \w of|strong="H3824"\w* \w you|strong="H6231"\w* \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H3824"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* brother \w in|strong="H1616"\w* \w your|strong="H6231"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3513"\w* \w they|strong="H5414"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* pulled \w away|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w stopped|strong="H3513"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* ears, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H5414"\w* might \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

Yea, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w adamant|strong="H8068"\w* \w stone|strong="H8068"\w*, lest \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*;

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* scatter \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5590"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*. \w Thus|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* land \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*.
